attributes.action: stop the playing of ball games on council estates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Would LIke The Playing Of Ball Games on Estates To Be Put To An End AS This Causes Terrible Strain On Peoples Lives Who Have To Deal With This Day To Day 24/7 People Ask For Help And They Dont Get It They Just Get Ignored And Is Nothing More We Can Do I Am  Asking For Help We Need This To Stop Their Is Only So Much People Can Take Before It Starts To Affect Them Please I Ask You To Sign If You Agree With Me I Thank You If You Do

rejection.details: Please re-draft with normal use of capital letters - this is very difficult to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
